tourBios.curYrHigh: Had a poor start to the Mainland China Qualifying Tournament in early March at Wolong Lake GC in Liuzhou. Following an opening 81, shot rounds of 72-76-72 to T11 with Tu Xuan Wu, securing his fully-exempt playing privileges for the entire season.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Played sparingly on the PGA TOUR China Series, with both of his appearances coming late in the seasonâ€”at the Nine Dragons Open and the Hainan Open. He missed the cut in both tournaments.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA Tour China Serie was T56th in 2015 at the Capital Airline HNA Real Estate Championship.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T65th in Par 3 Birdie or Better Leaders on the PGA Tour China Series.
